item.title: hi!
item.description:
welcome to my blog.

i use this place to speak my mind, and share things that interest me / stuff that i think other people should know about!

check readme for more info.

item.title: hi!
item.description: welcome to my blog. i use this place to speak my mind, and share things that interest me / stuff that i think other people should know about! where on the internet you can find me euphoriamachine - my artist landing page, where you will find all my music. personal accounts mastodon - pretty decent place, all things considered tumblr - my tumblr, that i check irregularly bsky - i have nothing to say on this one
